plugin.name: Image Convert
page.title: Settings - Image Convert
settings.header.label: Image Convert
settings.sub-header.label: Configure the settings for the Image Convert - Plugin
settings.form.outputFormat.description: Select the output format for image conversion. You can also disable the plugin. Note: AVIF formats will not be resized
settings.form.ouputFormat.label: Output Format
settings.form.jpeg.description: Enable this option to convert JPEG images to the selected format.
settings.form.jpeg.label: Convert JPEG Images
settings.form.png.description: Enable this option to convert PNG images to the selected format.
settings.form.png.label: Convert PNG Images
settings.form.tiff.description: Enable this option to convert TIFF images to the selected format.
settings.form.tiff.label: Convert TIFF Images
